thread.title: Schlumberger to acquire Cameron in $14.8 billion deal
thread.title_full: Schlumberger to acquire Cameron in $14.8 billion deal - MarketWatch

author: Victor Reklaitis
title: Schlumberger to acquire Cameron in $14.8 billion deal
text:
Oilfield-services giant Schlumberger Ltd. SLB, -4.95% announced Wednesday that it plans to acquire Cameron International Corp. CAM, +42.95% in a deal valued at $14.8 billion, saying the deal offers "new growth opportunities by creating the industry's first complete drilling and production systems." Shares in Cameron, which makes equipment for the energy industry, gained 41% in premarket action, while Schlumberger shares fell 0.9%.
Read the full story: Schlumberger to buy Cameron International for $12.7 billion
